name: belenios-responsive-booth
description: Responsive booth for Belenios (a verifiable online voting system)

scripts.i18n-extract: echo 'Extracting translated strings from Javascript files and updating frontend_translations/*.json...' && npx i18next-parser

author: Stéphane Glondu, Véronique Cortier, Pierrick Gaudry, Quentin Grimaud, Alicia Filipiak, Vincent Cheval
